name: @f77/f77-hooks
description: Useful react hooks for everyday use
author: mavdmichael <michael+github@marknadsavdelningen.se>

scripts.pub: yarn version --patch && yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release' + $npm_package_version && git push origin main && yarn publish --tag $npm_package_version
scripts.pub:minor: yarn version --minor && yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release' + $npm_package_version && git push origin main && yarn publish --tag $npm_package_version
scripts.pub:major: yarn version --major&& yarn build && git commit -a -m 'Release' + $npm_package_version && git push origin main && yarn publish --tag $npm_package_version
